answers.answer:
Human trafficking is the recruitment, transportation, transfer, harbouring or receipt of persons by means of threats, use of force or other forms of psychological pressure for the purpose of further exploitation.

To find more detailed information, please visit the website dopomoha.ro/en/stay-safe and look under the "Stay safe Human trafficking" section. There you will find details on how to reduce vulnerability, child safety, and contacts for reporting suspicions.

answers.answer:
The "What to do in case of emergency or war" guide is a resource created by Ukrainian authorities that provides detailed instructions on how to prepare for and act during emergencies.

To find detailed information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/stay-safe and read under the section titled "Guide for what to do in case of emergency or war".
